faqs.question: What is the difference between a completion certificate and an occupancy certificate
faqs.answer: A Completion Certificate CC confirms that the building construction is finished according to the approved plan. An Occupancy Certificate OC is issued after the CC confirming that the building is safe and fit for human habitation and has all necessary civic amenities like water and electricity connection. When buying a flat in Sarsehri always ensure the project has a valid OC before moving in.

faqs.question: Are property taxes included in the flat maintenance charges in Sarsehri

Maintenance charges cover common area upkeep security services amenities management and shared utilities. We clarify these distinctions when assisting you with purchasing any flat in Sarsehri.
